Posts.Content: It's been over a year since I finished radiotherapy and I take Tamoxifen daily. So am wondering if my immune system has been effected as I have a really bad cold with flu like symptoms. I'm not usually prone to these type of ailments. I worked all of last week but had to go sick on Monday lunchtime as I felt so rotten. Am getting better but very slowly.Â
